posts.title: Teamfight Tactics patch 12.4  notes
posts.desc: Neon Nights takes you to the place where Choncc and Pengu are destined to put their battle bots to the test. The Hextech Battle Arena is a futuristic esports arena that casts your games with over 50 unique lines that respond to your actions. Win or lose, this arena will let you know. Have you TFT games casted by our very first robo-nouncer for 1900 RP/TC!

posts.title: Patch 12.4 notes
posts.desc: This patch the Chem-Baroness Ms. Renata Glasc begins her corporate takeover of the Rift. We also have a few buffs for Kalista, Lucian, and Xayah to freshen up the current ADC assortment among other balances. Meanwhile in top lane, things have been a little tense with our enchanter friends, so we have some support gold income changes to help address the current situation. Lastly, be sure to keep your heart rate in check as we introduce a new set of stunning Shockblade skins!

posts.title: OPERATION: OVERRIDE | Neon Nights Launch Cinematic - Teamfight Tactics
posts.desc: While Pengu and Choncc are away, PROJECT Abyssia makes their play.

posts.title: League of Legends: 2022 Clash Schedule
posts.desc: With the 2022 season upon us weâ€™re also looking at another year of Clash! In order to give you the time you need to coordinate your teams, here is our planned tournament schedule for the year.

products.name: Snowboard Poro Figure
products.desc: Bomb down the slope with the Snowboarder Poro figure and their trusty board.

products.name: Myethos Jinx 1/7 Scale Figure
products.desc: Wreak havoc on Piltover with Jinx, the Loose Cannon. There's no such thing as a boring day when you have your best friends Pow-Pow and Fishbones.

products.name: Firecracker Teemo Hoodie (Unisex)
products.desc: Firecracker Teemo has an explosively delicious present for you (be warned - it's probably full of mushrooms!) Show off your love for Teemo and bring luck to your new year with this super comfy hoodie.

products.name: Firecracker Teemo Figure
products.desc: The adorable and fiesty Firecracker Teemo is ready to lead you into a wonderful new year. This is a Limited Edition figure, so don't miss out!

products.name: Sugar Rush Poro Figure
products.desc: Your love has summoned the fluffy and adorable Sugar Rush Poro Figure - alongside his tiny yet adorable Sweetheart Tibbers companion.

products.name: Saki and Riku Plush Set
products.desc: Even though Star Guardian Rakan and Xayah have been corrupted, their familiars will never leave their side.

products.name: VALORANT Sage Longsleeve Tee (Unisex)
products.desc: Enter your email below to get notified when this product is back in stock!

products.name: VALORANT Killjoy Longsleeve Tee (Unisex)
products.desc: "Ah, my genius doesn't stop in the lab."

products.name: VALORANT Omen Longsleeve Tee (Unisex)
products.desc: "You thought you could escape my nightmare?!"

products.name: BE@RBRICK Jinx 100% & 400%
products.desc: "Let's just behave... said no one, ever."  The Loose Cannon's mayhem is brought to life in this Limited Edition BE@RBRICK.

products.name: Storm Dragon Lee Sin Figure
products.desc: "I will master the dragon's spirit, or die trying."

products.name: Cho'Gath Team Mini
products.desc: Limited Edition Cho'Gath will feast upon the world and feed the souls to the Void.

products.name: Immortal Journey Irelia & Talon DUO Figures
products.desc: The epic duel between these two are now available as #01 in Series 4.
